comments:
Determines output length of a transposed convolution given input length.

# Arguments dim_size: Integer, the input length. stride_size: Integer, the stride along the dimension of `dim_size`. kernel_size: Integer, the kernel size along the dimension of `dim_size`. padding: One of `"same"`, `"valid"`, `"full"`. output_padding: Integer, amount of padding along the output dimension, Can be set to `None` in which case the output length is inferred. dilation: dilation rate, integer.

# Returns The output length (integer).
